extractionStrategy.phase2: Extract using osrscachereader or alternative tools
extractionStrategy.phase4: Generate unified manifest and optimize for game client

instructions: 1. Download latest OSRS cache from OpenRS2 archive
2. Install osrscachereader or use alternative cache tools
4. Validate and optimize assets for web deployment
5. Generate final manifest for game client integration
